attributes.action: Recognise the Police force's general failure to protect the citizens of the UK and NI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A government is a product of its people, not the other way around. Without us, it has no authority. We must let those in power know that if nothing useful is done about the current state of fear that many of us live in, then they will have that power snatched away. There is nothing melodramatic about demanding safety in a democratic country. Unless of course we are mistaken, and Britain is not a democratic nation. Prove the latter is wrong, Mr Blair.
